"I fully understood this statement, and promise that I possess all qualifications required. I will be responsible for consequences caused by activating the 'Amateur Channel', 'Custom Channel' and 'Repeater List'."
Please ensure the radio is switched on and connected to the phone
"为正常使用手机拍照功能。 请在设置-应用-小米对讲机-权限管理中开启相机权限。"
"为了提供位置共享、轨迹记录和蓝牙设备扫描连接功能。 请在设置-应用-小米对讲机-权限管理中开启定位权限。"
"为正常使用相册、文件下载及保存等功能。 请在设置-应用-小米对讲机-权限管理中开启读写手机存储权限。"
Coming soon to download the file
The task already exists, do not repeat click to download!
Wi-Fi disconnected. Continue the download via mobile data network?
The selected file can not be larger than %s MB
To use mobile phone camera, please grant the camera permission to Mi PTT+.

"In order to provide location sharing, track recording and Bluetooth device scanning and connection functions, Xi'an Fengyu Information Technology Co., Ltd. (contact: privacy@ifengyu.com) needs to collect your location information (personal sensitive information) through the Mi PTT+ app, and put it in the Store, transfer and trace until you withdraw your authorization. You can revoke the authorization through the system permission setting function, or apply to delete the collected data through the user rights center. If you refuse to authorize, you will not be able to use theese functions.
Please enable the location permission in Settings > Apps > Mi PTT+ > Permission Management."
To use the photo album, file download and save functions, please grant the storage permission to Mi PTT+.
To scan the devices, you need to turn on [Location Services] of your phone
Supports most Bluetooth headsets currently available on the market.
"After connecting to a Bluetooth device, the walkie-talkie's PTT button needs to be used to transmit."
Supports transmitting via the PTT button on the BeeBest Bluetooth headset.
On most Bluetooth devices, you can enter Bluetooth pairing mode by pressing down and holding the On/Off button until the indicator light begins to flash.
"Different devices will have different ways of entering Bluetooth pairing mode. Please refer to your product's instruction manual for detailed instructions."
Call without having to press the PTT button
An App Store or Browser is not available for downloading. Install one manually.

The device is the current call group, and the voice information of the group can be automatically played.

Set the receiving sub-audible audio tones to block signals that do not match the sub-audible audio tones transmitted
To communicate normally, the other party needs to set the same sub-audible audio tone transmissions after one party sets to receive these tones
"You have not added any group lists yet. Please click the \"+\" button in the upper right corner to add"
Exit the User Experience Improvement Program
Use this info for diagnosis only.

Identity verified, please set your new password.

The walkie talkie applied a different language from that of the app, upgrading firmware to fix this?
Help the walkie-talkie connect to other Bluetooth devices
Help the walkie-talkie connect to other Bluetooth devices
Join our User Experience Improvement Program
Tap the button below, to use the currently connected walkie-talkie to initiate the batch configuration.

Press and hold the volume - button on the receiving walkie-talkie first, then press and hold the PTT button for three seconds until the indicator turns orange, and the walkie-talkie has entered the receiving configuration state.
Walkie-talkie has exited the batch configuration mode.
Back up the walkie-talkie channel list to the configuration file now?
Tap the back up walkie-talkie channels button below to add.
Press the【PTT (push-to-talk) button】to accept the connection, or press the【power button】to reject the connection.
This channel is currently empty, please edit it first.
Import this configuration file to the walkie-talkie?
Quickly synchronize the same configuration with multiple walkie-talkies.
Import new file to the walkie-talkie

Connect the walkie-talkie and use the walkie-talkie for network chat
Please hold the walkie-talkie near the Bluetooth device you wish to connect to.
Camera permission not granted. Go to Settings to grant permission
Please tick to agree to the relevant agreement.
Please select the Bluetooth device you want to connect to in the list below.
Please select a connected device or search for new devices.
Please select the device you are using
Please make sure you have entered Bluetooth pairing mode.
Please make sure that the walkie-talkie has more than three battery bars

"Connect the walkie-talkie for normal scanning, use map, location sharing, and other functions.
Please enable [Location] in [Settings]."
Reduce Power Consumption and Increase Usage Time
Enabling Power Saving Mode might reduce the effective communication distance.
This app may not work correctly without the requested permissions. Open the app settings screen to modify app permissions.
Alphanumeric password of 8 to 16 characters long
This phone number has already been registered.
Data loading failed, please check your network
After revoking the User Agreement and Privacy Policy consent, Bluetooth connection to the device will be closed
Revoke User Agreement and Privacy Policy consent
After revoking the User Agreement and Privacy Policy consent, you will be logged out and your account data will be cleared
Channels are unsettable in scanning mode
Please cancel the pairing with the Bluetooth headset in Settings > Bluetooth of your mobile phone first and then use the app’s Bluetooth Connection Assistant feature to connect.

For some headsets, they are able to be discovered and connected only in pairing mode after canceling the pairing with your mobile phone. Please refer to the user manual for how to enter the pairing mode.
Have you connected the Bluetooth headset to your mobile phone?
For most Bluetooth headsets, they will enter the pairing mode by pressing and holding the power button until the indicator light flashes.
The way to enter pairing mode varies on different devices. Please refer to the user manual for details.
Is your Bluetooth headset in the pairing mode?

The Bluetooth headset cannot be discovered and connected if the Bluetooth feature of the walkie-talkie is not activated. Please refer to the walkie-talkie user manual for how to activate its Bluetooth feature.
409.7500 - 409.9875, press and hold the channel number to edit sub-codes.
430.0000 - 440.0000, press and hold the channel number to edit sub-codes.
Please describe your problem, to which we will give as much support as possible
Setting is successful, and will take effect after restart the device
Enter a name for the radio
Talk freely during every unknown expedition.
Communication distance is further at high power
Prohibit transmitting when current channel is occupied
Support the use of the BEEBEST Bluetooth earphone，please upgrade firmware before use it.
Using the button-free function in a noisy environment can easily cause false triggering. For better use, please avoid using this function in a noisy environment
After turning on this function, you can talk to each other without pressing the intercom call button.
Channels are unsettable in teaming mode
Please activate before using this frequency

Distance is too short for recording and will be discarded by default. End this tracking?
Both input and output Uri must be specified

Used to store in-app account information and devices information
Please agree to use necessary permissions mentioned above

You are welcome to use Mi PTT+. You can use this application to manage the Mi Walkie-Talkie radios, view and share the location, track and record movements, and so on. We will strictly abide by relevant laws and regulations and privacy policies to protect your personal information. In order to provide basic services, necessary personal information is collected.
